turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I wanted to place an order for pizza from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Four large pizzas with thick crust. The first I'd like is pepperoni and sausage. The second I'd like would be Hawaiian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the third would be veggie lover's vegetarian, and the fourth would be mushroom and onion, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large thick crust pizzas, one pepperoni and sausage, one hawaiin, one veggie lovers, and one mushroom and onions, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thank you so much.
